text: Bruce Lee, The Legend is a 1984 Hong Kong documentary movie produced by Golden Harvest. It is the sequel of Bruce Lee, the Man and the Legend, scenes from this documentary, archive footage of Bruce Lee, posthumous movies and interviews. == Other websites == * Bruce Lee - The Legend on IMDb Category:1984 movies Category:1980s sports movies Category:Hong Kong movies Category:Documentary movies Category:Bruce Lee Category:Golden Harvest movies Category:Documentaries about Bruce Lee
title: Bruce Lee, The Legend
